title: Britain's Got Talent 2019 final, as it happened: singing war veteran Colin Thackeray wins variety contest
text:
Chelsea pensioner Colin Thackeray, 89, triumphs in 13th live final of Britain's Got Talent

Magic acts X and Ben Hart finish second and third respectively

Grand final featured guest performances from Susan Boyle, Michael Ball and dance troupe Diversity

An oldie but goldie tottered off with top prize. Here are all the talking points and social media reaction from the two-and-a-half hour grand final...

Chelsea Pensioner's win was predictable but rousing

War veteran Colin Thackeray came into this final as the bookies’ hot favourite and was given the plum slot of performing last, just before the public vote opened. It seemed preordained that he would win and so it proved.

The 89-year-old had tugged...
description: An oldie but goldie tottered off with top prize.
